item.title: About Faisal Khan
item.description: Learn about Faisal Khan LLC - Expert consulting in cross-border payments, banking access, financial licensing, and crypto compliance. Solving complex financial challenges globally.
item.content:encoded:
About Faisal Khan

Solving Complex Problems in Banking, Payments & Cryptocurrency

I’m Faisal Khan‚Äîan independent consultant, information broker, and dealmaker in the world of cross-border payments, banking, and financial licensing. Over the years, I’ve built a reputation for solving the toughest challenges in banking, fintech, and money transmission‚Äîthe kind of problems others often walk away from.

With a deep, hands-on understanding of the banking and payments landscape across multiple jurisdictions, I help businesses navigate the complex web of regulations, compliance, licensing, and financial partnerships. Whether you need a multi-currency IBAN, a money transmitter license, banking-as-a-service, or crypto on-ramping/off-ramping solutions, I help cut through the noise and get things done.

What I Do Best

‚úÖ Problem-Solving for Tough Cases ‚Äì If it’s complicated, I’m interested. My expertise is in finding solutions where others see roadblocks.

‚úÖ Global Banking & Licensing Expertise ‚Äì I have an in-depth understanding of banking laws, financial structures, and payments infrastructure across Europe, the US, the Middle East, and offshore jurisdictions.

‚úÖ Strategic Introductions & Deal Flow ‚Äì My network connects startups, fintechs, and established players with the right banking and financial partners.

‚úÖ Payments & Crypto Advisory ‚Äì Helping businesses bridge the gap between fiat and crypto, compliance, and scalable financial solutions.

‚úÖ Banking-As-A-Service & Embedded Finance ‚Äì Structuring banking solutions for fintechs looking to integrate payments, cards, and banking rails seamlessly.

‚úÖ Cryptocurrency Advocate & Thought Leader ‚Äì A firm believer in Bitcoin, DeFi, and the future of crypto, helping businesses navigate the world of on-chain, off-chain, and regulatory challenges.

Why Work With Me?

üìå Proven Track Record ‚Äì I’ve facilitated multi-million and billion-dollar deals, helping businesses secure the banking and payment solutions they need to scale.

üìå Unmatched Industry Knowledge ‚Äì Banking and payments regulations are a maze, and I know how to navigate them across different countries and jurisdictions.

üìå Global Network ‚Äì Access to decision-makers, banks, fintech players, and regulatory experts that can make things happen.

üìå Straight-Talking & Results-Driven ‚Äì I don’t waste time on fluff. If you need solutions, I provide clear, actionable advice that gets results.

A Lifelong Learner & Collector

Beyond consulting, I’m an avid reader, constantly expanding my knowledge on money, banking, payments, economics, and cryptocurrency. In 2025, I aim to read 125 books‚Äîbecause understanding financial systems means staying ahead of the curve.

I also have a passion for history and collecting antiques. My personal collection includes vinyl records, walking sticks, and old cameras, each piece carrying a story and a glimpse into the past.

Let’s Talk

I offer a free 15-minute discovery call to assess whether we’re a good fit. If you’re serious about finding the right banking, licensing, or payment solutions, let’s connect.

A Bit More About Me

üìå Banking & Payments Expert | 6x Quora Top Writer | Internet Junkie

üéµ NFAK & Jazz Fan | Crypto Believer | Vintage Collector

üìö Avid Reader | 125 Books in 2025 Goal | Deep Dive into Money & Economics

üìù Learning Urdu | Dad to Kids & Cats | Calling Istanbul Home
